com.gensym.jgi
Interface G2Access

All Known Subinterfaces:
G2Connection
public interface G2Access

This interface class provides the outbound methods required for accessing a connection to G2

Method Summary

Method Detail

addG2ConnectionListener

public void addG2ConnectionListener(G2ConnectionListener listener)
Add a G2ConnectionListener, who will be informed of any G2Connection events for a G2 connection.

removeG2ConnectionListener

public void removeG2ConnectionListener(G2ConnectionListener listener)
Remove a G2ConnectionListener, who was previously listening for G2Connection events.

returnMessage

public void returnMessage(String message)
Return a message to the connected G2.

The message text is sent to the MESSAGE-BOARD item in the current KB of the connected G2.

Parameters:
message - the message to send to G2's message board

reportLogBookErrorMessage

public void reportLogBookErrorMessage(Symbol error_symbol,
                                      String error_message)
Report an Error Message to the Log book of the connected G2.
Parameters:
errorSymbol - A Symbol to identify the error
errorMessage - A String detailing the error

closeConnection

public void closeConnection()
Close an active connection with a G2. The connection is not alive after this point. Any attempts to call RPCs through this Gateway will fail.

isAlive

public boolean isAlive()
Determines if this Gateway can be used for RPC calls to G2 or not. It will return true once it has initialized properly and until it is closed (either by a method call or from the server).
Returns:
boolean true if it is OK to call RPCs through this Gateway, false otherwise
See Also:
closeConnection()

registerJavaMethod

public void registerJavaMethod(Object target,
                               String method_name,
                               Symbol g2_RPD_name)
Register a method of a Java object, so that it can be called by a connected G2. This method declares that when G2 CALLS or STARTS a specified REMOTE-PROCEDURE-DECLARATION (RPD) across a GSI connection to Javalink then JavaLink will attempt to call [target].[method_name](params_from_G2_call...). JavaLink will call method_name with the number and type of parameters sent from G2 during the G2 RPC call. If target does not have the corresponding method_name with the correct parameter signature then JavaLink will raise a java.lang.NoSuchMethodException. Note: For the most optimal performance, it is recommended that Methods are registered with the second variant of this method, where a java.lang.reflect.Method is registered instead of a method String this saves significant time, as JavaLink does not need to lookup the registered method each time. However, by registering a method with a string allows JavaLink to dynamically dispatch a method call based on the method name and the parameters sent from G2.
Parameters:
target - The object on which the method is to be called.
method_name - The method to made visible.
g2_RPD_name - The G2 REMOTE-PROCEDURE-DECLARATION name to be associated with method_name for target.
Throws:
DuplicateLocalRPCException - When g2_RPD_name has already been declared as a G2 RPC.

registerJavaMethod

public void registerJavaMethod(Object target,
                               Method java_method,
                               Symbol g2_RPD_name,
                               boolean call_in_new_thread)
Register a prelooked up Method of a Java object, so that it can be called by a connected G2. This method declares that when G2 CALLS or STARTS a specified REMOTE-PROCEDURE-DECLARATION (RPD) across a GSI-INTERFACE(connected to JAVALINK) then JavaLink will attempt to call [target].[java_method](params...) registered for the RPD name using registerJavaMethod Note, JavaLink will call java_method with the number and type of parameters sent from G2 during the G2 RPC call. If java_method does not have the correct parameter signature then JavaLink will raise a java.lang.NoSuchMethodException.
Parameters:
target - The object on which the method is to be called.
java_method - The method to made visible.
g2_RPD_name - The G2 REMOTE-PROCEDURE-DECLARATION name to be associated with method_name for target.
call_in_new_thread - Set true to create a new thread for the execution of the method otherwise a G2 RPC call to Java will be queued with all other method calls for this G2Connection.
Throws:
DuplicateLocalRPCException - When g2_RPD_name has already been declared as a G2 RPC.

callRPC

public Object callRPC(Symbol g2_procedure_name,
                      Object[] args,
                      int timeout)
               throws G2AccessException
Call a predeclared G2 procedure/method synchronously (wait until the call returned or a timeout) The current thread will wait until the remote G2 has executed.

To call a G2 method the first argument in args must be a G2 Item of the appropriate class.

Parameters:
g2_procedure_name - The predeclared G2 procedure/method to call.
args - The Object array to pass to the G2 procedure/method as its arguments.
timeout - Time in milliseconds to wait for the return, 0 for indefinite.
Returns:
The result of the G2 procedure/method.
Throws:
G2AccessException - when a problem occurs as a result of calling this RPC in G2.
TimeoutException - if the the RPC takes longer than the timeout period.

callRPC

public Object callRPC(Symbol g2_procedure_name,
                      Object[] args)
               throws G2AccessException
Call a predeclared G2 procedure/method synchronously (wait until then call returned or a timeout). The current thread will wait until the remote G2 has executed.

To call a G2 method the first argument in args must be a G2 Item of the appropriate class.

Parameters:
g2_procedure_name - The predeclared G2 procedure to call.
args - The Object array to pass to the G2 procedure/method as its arguments.
Returns:
The result of the G2 procedure/method.
Throws:
G2AccessException - when a problem occurs as a result of calling this RPC in G2.
TimeoutException - if the the RPC takes longer than the default timeout period.

startRPC

public void startRPC(Symbol g2_procedure_name,
                     Object[] items)
Start a predeclared remote G2 procedure, ignore any return values. The method returns Immediately. The G2 procedure must have been previously declared using method declareRemoteRPC
Parameters:
g2_procedure_name - The G2 procedure to call
items - The array of objects to pass as arguments

canCallRPC

public boolean canCallRPC()
Indicates whether this thread can successfully call an RPC synchronously If this call returns false, then a call to callRPC will throw an Exception.
Returns:
true if synchronous RPC calls are allowed in the current Thread, false otherwise.

setRemoteRPCReturnKind

public void setRemoteRPCReturnKind(Symbol g2_procedure_name,
                                   int return_value_type)
Set the value type of the return type of a object parameter from a remote RPC call
Parameters:
return_value_type - either PASS_BY_COPY or PASS_BY_HANDLE

getG2ProxyForJavaObject

public Item getG2ProxyForJavaObject(String javaProxyClass,
                                    Symbol g2ParentClass,
                                    Object javaObject)
                             throws G2AccessException
Return an Item that represents a G2 ITEM that is a proxy for a Java Object.
Parameters:
javaProxyClass - the G2 Class name, used to create an instance of a proxy in the event that an existing proxy could not be found. Set null to use the default G2 Class registered for the class of JavaObject.
g2ParentClass - the G2 class created that will inherit from this G2 Class
javaObject - the Java Object to create a proxy for.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2 or a G2 Class could not be found to create the proxy ITEM

getUniqueNamedItem

public Item getUniqueNamedItem(Symbol itmClass,
                               Symbol itmName)
                        throws G2AccessException
Retrieves a specific named Item from a G2. Use this method to get a "root" item after making a connection to G2.
Parameters:
itmClass - a Symbol naming the class of the Item
itmName - the name of the Item
Returns:
the requested Item
Throws:
G2AccesException - if any error occurs during communication or if no such Item exists

getItemWithUUID

public Item getItemWithUUID(String uuid)
                     throws G2AccessException
Retrieves a specific Item with the specified uuid from a G2. Use this method to get a "root" item after making a connection to G2. Requires G2 version 6.0 or greater
Parameters:
uuid - a String specifying the uuid of the Item;
Returns:
the requested Item
Throws:
G2AccessException - if any error occurs during communication or if no such Item exists

getClassManager

public ClassManager getClassManager()
Returns the ClassManager used to manage classes for this connection.

getInterfaceForG2Class

public Class getInterfaceForG2Class(Symbol className_)
Returns the java Class for the interface corresponding to the G2 class named by the argument.

Note: This method must only be called on an active connection.

Parameters:
className_ - the name of a G2 class
Returns:
the Class for the corresponding interface

getAttributeDescriptions

public Sequence getAttributeDescriptions(Symbol className,
                                         Sequence attributeNames)
                                  throws G2AccessException
Returns a Sequence of structures describing each attribute of the class (See Attribute Export for details of the format of this information)
Parameters:
className - a Symbol naming the G2 class
attributeNames - a Sequence of symbols naming attributes of className for which to retreive attribute descriptions. A zero length Sequence may be passed in to retreive the descriptions of all attributes.
Returns:
A Sequence containing structures, each of which is a description of an attribute of the class.

g2UnixTime

public double g2UnixTime()
                  throws G2AccessException
Returns the current system time in the connected G2
Returns:
The current unix system time (elapsed since Jan 1, 1970) at the connected G2.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2

g2UnixTimeAtStart

public double g2UnixTimeAtStart()
                         throws G2AccessException
Returns the time when G2 was started most recently.
Returns:
The double value of the time when G2 was most recently started.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2

                     throws G2AccessException
Gets the host name of the machince on which the connected G2 is running on.
Returns:
The machine's host name of the connected G2.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2

g2GetPortNumberOrName

public String g2GetPortNumberOrName()
                             throws G2AccessException
Gets the TCP/IP port number or name on which the connected G2 is listening for network connections.
Returns:
The connected G2's listener TCP/IP port number or port name as a String.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2

g2GetPortNumberOrNameGivenIndex

public String g2GetPortNumberOrNameGivenIndex(int index)
                                       throws G2AccessException
Returns the current port number or name based on a network type index.
Parameters:
index - An integer of 1 or 2.
Returns:
A Text string of the current port number or name.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2

g2GetSoftwareVersion

public String g2GetSoftwareVersion()
                            throws G2AccessException
Gets the current version of the G2 Software.
Returns:
A String value of the system and software version of the connected G2 process.
Throws:
G2AccessException - When there is a problem communicating with G2.

getSecureContext

public boolean getSecureContext()

getG2State

public Symbol getG2State()
                  throws G2AccessException
Returns the current run state of G2.
Returns:
a symbol that is one of RUNNING, PAUSED, or RESET
Throws:
G2AccesException - if any error occurs during communication with G2
See Also:
G2Gateway.getG2State(), G2Gateway.RUNNING_, G2Gateway.PAUSED_, G2Gateway.RESET_

setG2State

public Symbol setG2State(Symbol newState)
                  throws G2AccessException
Sets the run state of G2. In order to restart G2, first change to RESET then change to RUNNING.
Parameters:
the - desired new state of G2. This should be one of the following Symbols - RUNNING, PAUSED, or RESET
Throws:
G2AccesException - if any error occurs during communication with G2
See Also:
G2Gateway.getG2State(), G2Gateway.RUNNING_, G2Gateway.PAUSED_, G2Gateway.RESET_

getStrictInstancesOfClass

public Sequence getStrictInstancesOfClass(Symbol g2ClassName_)
                                   throws G2AccessException
Retreives all strict instances of a given class. In other words, given a class A and its subclass B, assuming instances of both A and B exist in the KB, getStrictInstancesOfClass (A) will not include instances of B. In order to gather all instances of a class including subclasses, use getDirectSubClasses and call getStrictInstances recursively. getStrictInstancesOfClass returns stubs (by-handle) not objects (by-copy) so there will be no attribute downloading.
Parameters:
g2ClassName_ - a Symbol naming a class
Returns:
a Sequence of 0 or more Items of the class g2ClassName_
Throws:
G2AccessException - if there any errors during communication or within the call
See Also:
#getDirectSubClasses

getDirectSubclasses

public Sequence getDirectSubclasses(Symbol g2ClassName_)
                             throws G2AccessException
Retreives the names of all direct subclasses of a given class. Use this method recursively to gather all subclasses of a given class.
Parameters:
g2ClassName_ - a Symbol naming a class
Returns:
a Sequence of Symbols naming the direct subclasses
Throws:
G2AccessException - if there any errors during communication or within the call

setInterfaceDebugOptions

public void setInterfaceDebugOptions(boolean on)
Sets the debugging state of the underlying g2 interface class. Should avoid using this in three-tier situations, as others may be using the middle tier that is slowed down by turning on debug.

setInterfaceDebugOptions

public void setInterfaceDebugOptions(int level)
Sets the debugging level of the underlying g2 interface class.

createItem

public Item createItem(Symbol className)
                throws G2AccessException
Creates a new Item in G2 and returns it
Parameters:
className - a Symbol naming the class of the item to create
Throws:
G2AccessException - if any error occurs while communicating with G2

getDefinition

public G2Definition getDefinition(Symbol g2ClassName)
                           throws G2AccessException
Returns the definition Item for any G2 class
Throws:
G2AccessException - when a problem occurs as a result of communicating with G2.
